JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Cleaning Assistant for 30 hrs + a week/ daywork in Ry/Skanderborg/Silkeborg
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
I am seeking a cleaning assistant to work 

1. Monday to Friday ( possibility of extra hours in evenings/weekends if desired)

2. Working hours from ca. kl 8.00 to kl 16.00

3. Minimum of 30 hours + pr. week

3. Cleaning at various addresses in Ry, Skanderborg, Silkeborg.

4. Must have your own car and be willing to use it.

5. Cleaning customers comprises of a mixture of offices and private homes.

6. Must be able to work independantly.

7. Must be able to speak at least English and some Danish would be an advantage

8. Hourly pay is 142.00 kr.

9. Previous experience in cleaning would be an advantage.

10. Start date as soon as possible.

Please send a job application and CV to

Billskembes@hotmail.dk
